Description
Audio
This class defines methods that implement audio functionality

AudioTester
 
buttonRendering
draw buttons on a window, with a variety of customisation options.
CharacterPhysics
This class defines methods that help to organise how objects behave in the physics simulation.
CollisionHandler
This class defines methods that help to detect and handle collisions
EntityPhysics
This class defines methods that help to organise how objects behave in the physics simulation.
Floor
This class defines methods and attributes useful when handling floor physics
imageRendering
draw images on a window, with a variety of customisation options.
Input
This class defines methods for gathering data for Keyboard and Mouse input It uses Event Listeners to wait for input.
Movement
This class defines methods that help to organise how objects move in the physics simulation.
MovementTest
 
Physics
This class defines overall attributes common across all if not most attributes
PhysicsTest
 
PhysicsTester
 
Renderer
Define the drawing of a window on the screen which objects can be later added to.
RendererTest
 
RendererTester
To check the functions written in the classes associated with rendering perform correctly.
